name: Quest 2 - The Ancient Temples
description:
Quest 2 - The Ancient Temples is a role-playing game for the Game Boy Color, and is the 2nd Quest game.

Taking place directly after the events of Quest - The Adventure for the 6 Stones in the year of 2036, the Wooden Knight and his friends, Alex and Brian, discover that the six legendary stones have to be recharged due to not being used in a very long time. This takes them to a region of Light Island called the Solar Region, where they have to find six ancient temples that can bring back the power of the stones. Along the way, they meet new friends and new foes, as well as beings that were around during the time of the Hero of the Past.

(Demo to be released soon...)
